name: HyperEdge
overview:
HyperEdge Corporation designs and markets loop management systems and access equipment for the local exchange carrier markets. It offers UNELink loop management system, which is designed to address the challenges of scaling DSL networks by automating the assignment, provisioning, testing, turn up, and protection of local services without the need to dispatch technicians. The company also provides T1-based broadband access products. Its products transform the edge of the local loop into a network interface. The company serves large and medium-sized commercial customers.

HyperEdge Corporation was formerly known as Troncom Corporation. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Batavia, Illinois. As of December 29, 2005, HyperEdge Corporation operates as a subsidiary of Westell Technologies, Inc.
